name: AWSOpsWorksAppEnvironment
description: Environment is a property of the AWS::OpsWorks::App resource that specifies the environment variable to associate with the AWS OpsWorks app.

properties.name: Key
properties.desc: The name of the environment variable, which can consist of up to 64 characters. You can use upper and lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores (_), but the name must start with a letter or underscore.

properties.name: Secure
properties.desc: Indicates whether the value of the environment variable is concealed, such as with a DescribeApps response. To conceal an environment variable's value, set the value to true.

properties.name: Value
properties.desc: The value of the environment variable, which can be empty. You can specify a value of up to 256 characters.
